unacloud.task.queue

Class QueueTaskerControl

  • java.lang.Object
    • unacloud.task.queue.QueueTaskerControl

  • public class QueueTaskerControl
extends Object
    Class used to put task in queue messaging service that will be read by Control project

    CesarF
